lead_paragraph: The National Highway Traffic Safety Administration is investigating 20 recalls covering more than 10 million vehicles.

headline.print_headline: Regulators Set Hearing on Recalls by Chrysler
headline.main: Regulators to Hold Hearing on Fiat Chrysler Safety Response

snippet: The National Highway Traffic Safety Administration is investigating 20 recalls covering more than 10 million vehicles.
abstract: National Highway Traffic Safety Administration says it will hold hearing to probe 20 recalls issued by Fiat Chrysler covering more than 10 million vehicles, after receiving reports of series of problems.
